Room.Name: Boran Street/Galgorn Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the corner of Boran Street and Galgorn Way.
Room.LongDescription: Boran Street runs north and south along the western side of Phexton Village, and Galgorn Way travels east and west to connect to the east side of the village. There are a few buildings to the north, but most of the village is south of here. The village green is in the center.
